Body.Content:
We are announcing the ability to analyze action usage for agents in Microsoft Copilot Studio. This feature allows you to understand usage patterns, identify areas for improvement, and optimize performance for agents. This feature will reach general availability on November 10, 2025.

How does this affect me?
With this feature, you gain enhanced visibility into how actions are being utilized within an agent and can leverage analytics to drive actionable insights. The metrics provided will include action usage rate, and error rate, giving you a comprehensive view of how users are interacting with actions.

Additionally, there will be a detailed breakdown of errors, allowing you to pinpoint specific issues and address them effectively. This experience will be available for connector, prompt, and REST API plug-in extensions.

What do I need to do to prepare?
This message is for awareness, and no action is required.

If you would like more information on this feature, please visit the Analyze action usage for agents article.

Title: Microsoft Copilot Studio - Analyze action usage for agents
